doc.field: NEGOTIATORS DRAFT DETAILS OF NEXT RUBBER PACT

- Rubber producers and consumers, who agreed last week on the central elements of a new international natural rubber pact, have started work on the legal drafting of a future accord, delegates said. Compromise on issues blocking an agreement was reached at a United Nations conference on an accord to replace the current pact, which expires in October. The new International Natural Rubber Agreement (INRA) is expected to be formally adopted on Friday.
